messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Yo yo whats good crew? its ya boii Crilp Dinglewagon speaking, Chemistry start making some space drugs cause its time to PARTY

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Bow Solar Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on scans from our long-range sensors, we believe that one of the station's animals/bots has developed security level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Remember to board the shuttle or take an escape pod. Honk.

messages.author: Osmund Kimple (Detective)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Osmund Kimple here, currently looking for jobs or tips of any kind. If there's something strange in your neighborhood, who ya gonna call? KIMPLE!</font>
